doc:
Warner Oland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warner_Oland 0 Warner Oland (born Johan Verner Ölund, October 3, 1879 – August 6, 1938) was a Swedish-American actor most remembered for playing several Chinese and Chinese-American characters: the Honolulu Police detective, Lieutenant Charlie Chan; Dr. Fu Manchu; and Henry Chang in Shanghai Express. His family emigrated to the United States when he was 13. He pursued a film career that would include time on Broadway and dozens of film appearances, including 16 Charlie Chan films. Warner_Oland ( born Johan_Verner_Ölund , October_3 , 1879 – August_6_,_1938 ) was a_Swedish-American_actor most_remembered for playing several_Chinese_and_Chinese-American_characters : the_Honolulu_Police_detective , Lieutenant_Charlie_Chan ; Dr._Fu_Manchu ; and Henry_Chang in Shanghai_Express . His_family emigrated to the_United_States when he was 13 . He pursued a_film_career that would_include time on Broadway and dozens of film_appearances , including 16_Charlie_Chan_films .
